_sText:
The anti-terror begin either in the arms factory, or in the post "CT". They can buy directly their weapons in the store, or then take a weapon of the arms factory or the post "CT". The terrorists begin in cells without weapons, except the knife. But 4 weapons are hidden there and 1 secret passage in 2 differentes cells...
Other weapons and secret passages are presents in the map. As zones there is: 
- Cells
- The arms factory
- The post "CT"
- The infirmary
- The cage
- The kitchen
- The polling booth
- The Mirador
- The labyrinth
- The soccer field
- The swimming pool
